title: Sustainable Community Learning Through Traditional Knowledge and Biodiversity Education

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental biodiversity concepts and digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners with professional experience in biore source management and sustainable development goals engage in collaborative activities using in-class digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can explain methods for connecting traditional knowledge with scientific data through local ecosystem observations
Learners can design ethical protocols for sharing biodiversity information on community-based platforms
Learners can create portfolios demonstrating the modern applicability of traditional knowledge through project deliverables
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
